description: De Bruijn sequence of order 6: every window of size 6, [a(j),a(j+1),...,a(j+5)], shows a different 6-tuple, for 0 <= j <= 63.
references: R. P. Stanley, Enumerative Combinatorics, Cambridge, Vol. 2, 1999; see Problem 5.6.12.
crossrefs: Cf. A016031. A169671 gives the earliest such sequence.
author: Leon J. Tate (leonjtate(AT)earthlink.net), Dec 14 2000
